summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests that verify the diff functionality of a version‑control system across a wide spectrum of scenarios, including handling of binary files, renames, copies, submodules, paths with spaces or unsafe characters, staged versus unstaged changes, initial commits, and multiple output formats. Includes a small utility to convert diff objects to raw string representations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the diff operation during development and maintenance, enabling early detection of regressions and ensuring that edge cases are properly supported in the version‑control implementation.
